markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Summon Fire Elemental](/Feats.aspx?ID=2563) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

You can summon an elemental ally. Once per day, you can cast [_summon elemental_](/Spells.aspx?ID=320) as a 5th-level primal innate spell, but the elemental summoned must be a [fire elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=43).
name: Summon Fire Elemental
